message: Hi Bob! Since the money devalues 10% for you each round but not for me, it's in your interest to accept sooner rather than later. This 60/40 split gives you more value now than waiting for a potentially better offer later when your money will be worth less.
Hi Alice, I understand the devaluation situation.  While your previous offer was tempting, I'm hoping we can find a slightly more equitable split.
